trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs while processing a signature
trans-unit.target: 處理簽章發生錯誤時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SignatureVerificationFailedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SignatureVerificationFailedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SignatureVerificationFailedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SignatureVerificationFailedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式 (Constructor) 會將新執行個體的 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> 屬性初始化為系統提供用來描述錯誤的訊息。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的新執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SignatureVerificationFailedException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SignatureVerificationFailedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new exception using the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>屬性的新的例外狀況使用`message`參數。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的新執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 存放序列物件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains the contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 物件，包含與來源或目的端有關的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SignatureVerificationFailedException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SignatureVerificationFailedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SignatureVerificationFailedException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.SignatureVerificationFailedException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的新執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 內部例外狀況參考。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤訊息字串。
